author: Alex O'Connor
description:
Get all sides of every story and be better informed at https://ground.news/AlexOC - subscribe for 40% off unlimited access.

For early, ad-free access to videos, and to support the channel, subscribe to my Substack: https://www.alexoconnor.com.

To donate to my PayPal (thank you): http://www.paypal.me/cosmicskeptic

 - VIDEO NOTES

In this video I attempt to prove that a hot dog is a kind of sandwich using every logical fallacy I can think of. ChatGPT features as my conversational partner.

The majority of the fallacies used are so-called 'informal' fallacies, which are not strictly related to the structure of an argument. For more: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_fallacies

title: Using Every Logical Fallacy on ChatGPT
